title: Bug 116829: Label height not changing with label font modification
description:
Description: The label font size does not change immediately when modified.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the user interface.
2. Edit the font size of the label and set it to "18 points".
OB: The label height does not change immediately after modifying the label font size.
EB: The label height should update immediately after modifying the label font size. It should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label in the user interface.
2. Edit the font size of the label and set it to "18 points".
3. Verify that the label height updates to accommodate the new font size.
